comments.label: [[Door Adjustments]] Improve
comments.text: Doors should be trimmed or adjusted as necessary to operate and seal properly.
comments.notesToAI: Use for doors rubbing, sticking, dragging, or not latching smoothly.

comments.label: [[Loose or Damaged Hardware]] Repair/Replace
comments.text: Damaged, nonfunctional, or missing door hardware should be repaired or replaced as needed.
comments.notesToAI: Use when hinges, latches, strike plates, or locking hardware are loose, missing, or malfunctioning.

comments.label: [[Loose Door Knob]] Repair/Replace
comments.text: Loose or nonfunctioning door knobs should be repaired or replaced.
comments.notesToAI: Use when a door knob spins freely, does not latch, or is visibly loose.

comments.label: [[Closet Door Guide]] Improve
comments.text: Interior sliding doors (such as closet doors) should have floor guides installed for proper operation.
comments.notesToAI: Use when sliding closet doors wobble, swing, or track improperly due to missing guides.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door â€“ Difficult Operation]] Improve
comments.text: The sliding glass door could be improved to operate freely.
comments.notesToAI: Use when the slider sticks, requires force, or drags on the track.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door Rollers]] Improve
comments.text: The rollers of the sliding glass door could be improved to operate freely.
comments.notesToAI: Use when rollers are worn, flat-spotted, stiff, or out of alignment.

comments.label: [[Old Sliding Door]] Monitor
comments.text: The sliding glass door is old. Older doors may require increased maintenance and eventual replacement.
comments.notesToAI: Use when the door is visibly older, original to the home, or shows age-related wear but still functions.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door Screen Damaged]] Repair/Replace
comments.text: The screen for the sliding glass door is damaged or needs adjustment.
comments.notesToAI: Use when screen mesh is torn, frame is bent, or screen is off-track.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door Screen Missing]] Monitor
comments.text: The screen for the sliding glass door is missing. Replacement may be desirable.
comments.notesToAI: Use when the slider has no screen installed.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door Hardware]] Repair/Replace
comments.text: The hardware for the sliding glass door is damaged and should be repaired or replaced.
comments.notesToAI: Use when handles, locks, latches, or mechanisms are damaged or failing.

comments.label: [[Sliding Door Threshold Leakage]] Monitor
comments.text: Evidence of leakage was observed at the sliding door threshold. Monitor during heavy rains and/or consult the seller regarding any prior leaks or repairs at this location.
comments.notesToAI: Use when staining, water marks, or caulk failure suggests past moisture entry, but no active leak is confirmed.

comments.label: [[Fire-Rated Door Missing]] Repair (Safety)
comments.text: The door between the garage and the house does not appear to be fire-rated. A properly rated door is recommended for safety.
comments.notesToAI: Use when the door is hollow-core, has a window, or otherwise appears not to meet fire separation standards.

comments.label: [[Door Not Sealed Against Fumes]] Repair
comments.text: The garage-to-house door is not properly sealed against vehicle fumes. Weatherstripping or other appropriate sealing is recommended.
comments.notesToAI: Use when gaps are visible around the door or weatherstripping is missing or damaged.

comments.label: [[Garage Entry Door Adjustment]] Repair
comments.text: The garage entry door should be adjusted to operate freely while still fitting tightly.
comments.notesToAI: Use when the door rubs, sticks, or does not latch smoothly.
